src:
Lengkap Sudah, Barcelona Kalah dan Luis Suarez Cedera
03 Nov 2019, 11:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Barcelona menelan kekalahan 1-3 dalam kunjungan ke kandang Levante pada pekan ke-11 La Liga 2019/20, Sabtu (2/11/2019) malam WIB. Kekalahan itu terasa lebih pahit usai Luis Suarez ditarik lebih cepat karena cedera.
Suarez harus menjalani tes lanjutan untuk mengecek kondisi betis kanannya. Dia ditarik keluar sebelum jeda babak pertama. Barca belum merilis pernyataan apa pun, hanya meminta waktu untuk menilai kondisi cedera yang sebenarnya.
Striker Uruguay ini tampak mulai merasa tidak nyaman usai dilanggar Carlos Clerc. Dia sempat mencoba memaksa bermain, tapi pada akhirnya harus digantikan Carles Perez.
Cedera Suarez ini jelas jadi kabar buruk bagi Barcelona. Baca selengkapnya di bawah ini ya, Bolaneters!
text:
Complete Already, Barcelona Lose and Injury Luis Suarez
Nov 3 2019, 11:00 by Bola.net
Barcelona - 1-3 defeat in a visit to home to Levante in the 11th week of La Liga 2019/20, Saturday (11/02/2019) night WIB. The defeat was more bitter after Luis Suarez was pulled faster due to injury.
Suarez must undergo further tests to check the condition of his right calf. He was pulled out before half-time. Barca have not released any statements, just asking for time to assess the actual condition of the injury.
The Uruguayan striker seemed to feel uncomfortable after being violated by Carlos Clerc. He had tried to force play, but in the end had to be replaced by Carles Perez.
Suarez's injury is clearly bad news for Barcelona. Read below, Bolaneters!
